txt.en: You have defeated the White Mountain captain
The Orc forces can be found in the Orc camp, Gríshru.\n\nDefeat the Orc forces.

'Good work my friend. These Orcs were no match for our blades. The Trolls were sizeable foes but we brought them down one by one.\n\n'Now they run into the mountain. Shall we enter the cavern to finish them off?'
It looks as if the Orc forces were expecting you
Arvaethor has asked you enter the Orc encampment with him and oust the forces from the Vale.

'If only my father was able to command the Vale as he once did in his younger years, we may have more men alongside us now. No matter. Let us do what we must for Ethring and push these foul creatures back into the mountain!'
The Orc camp of Gríshru is located in the north-eastern part of Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should enter Gríshru.
